p: The approach followed for furocoumarins and methoxycoumarins is based on the comparison between the combined furocoumarin and methoxycoumarin intake via the consumption of citrus by‐products as feed material and that via the use of the residual fraction of expressed lemon oil as a feed additive, as described in Section 3.2.2.3 ( Non‐volatile components: Furocoumarins and methoxycoumarins).
